urlText: Northern Beaches bus changes for Sun Run
content:
On Saturday 6 February from 6am until 10:15am route 166 services will be diverting and missing stops due to road closures in place for the Sun Run.

Stops will be missed in both directions along Howard Ave, The Strand, Griffin Rd, Adams St, Bennett St, North Steyne, Pine St, Cavill St and Queenscliff Rd in Manly, Queenscliff, Curl Curl, North Curl Curl and Dee Why while roads are closed.

Customers should allow extra time and check signs at bus stops to find their nearest stop.

Stops closed:
  • Manly, North Steyne nr Carlton St (stop ID 209554)
  • Manly, Pine St opp North Steyne SLSC (stop ID 209555)
  • Manly, North Steyne nr Pacific St (stop ID 209556)

urlText: Northern Beaches bus changes for Sun Run
content:
On Saturday 6 February from 6am until 10:15am route 167 services will be diverting and missing stops due to road closures in place for the Sun Run.

Services in both directions won’t be running between Freshwater and Manly. Services will run between Warringah Mall and Freshwater.

Customers should consider using other bus services during this time and check signs at bus stops.

Stops closed:
  • Manly, Manly Tennis Club, Belgrave St (stop ID 209541)

content: Route 674 is diverting via local streets away from St Marys Road due to flooding. Buses are missing one stop in each direction.

urlText: Some delays in Clyde and Granville
content: Due to heavy traffic on Parramatta Road, some buses are being delayed.
subtitle: Some delays in Clyde and Granville

properties.speechText: In Clyde and Granville, some buses are delayed up to 15 minutes due to heavy traffic on Parramatta Road.
